title: Mount Rainier National Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do        Open all year, Mount Rainier has something for everyone, from ranger programs to mountain climbing. NPS Photos   Â    Mount Rainier National Park offers excellent opportunities for scenic drives, hiking, and mountain climbing. Most roads are open from late May to early October and all provide stunning views and access to a variety of hiking trails and other sites. While many visitors attempt to see the park in a day, consider an in-depth exploration of one or two areas of the park. Also explore the links below (or in the left-hand side navigation bar) for activities available at Mount Rainier National Park.     Bicycling Camping Climbing Discover Wildflowers Fishing & Boating Hiking Trails Citizen Ranger Quests  Calendar For Kids Nearby Attractions Places to Go Ranger-led Programs Visitor Commercial Services Winter at Mount Rainier
